On Mon, Jun 9, 2008 at 5:51 PM, Robert Wenner <robert.wenner@...> wrote:=

> On Monday 09 June 2008 06:23, Phil Surette wrote:
>> I'd like to make a =
case for adding logging of assertions into junit.
>
> Actually, to me this =
defeats the purpose of JUnit.
> I want a simple green or red result.
> If I=
 have to go through umpteen thousand lines of log, I may as well test
> eve=
rything manually.

Nobody says you have to, but the fact that your tests pa=
ss doesn't
guarantee that you are testing what you think you are testing.

=
Which is why reports are an integral part of a testing framework.
